thread.title: GeoComply Launches "Solus" - Total Geolocation Solution for the Daily Fantasy Sports Industry
thread.title_full: GeoComply Launches "Solus" - Total Geolocation Solution for the Daily Fantasy Sports Industry

author: admin
title: GeoComply Launches "Solus" - Total Geolocation Solution for the Daily Fantasy Sports Industry
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/22/2015 @ 4:09 PM   GeoComply 
LAS VEGAS, Oct. 22, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- GeoComply USA , Inc. today announces the launch of "Solus," its new suite of services for the daily fantasy sports industry. Specially designed for the needs of this rapidly evolving sector, Solus provides cutting edge geolocation and anti-fraud solutions tailored for the particular operational and market needs of daily fantasy sports. 
"DFS is one of the fastest growing sectors in the United States today, and with DraftDay, we are really excited to work with one of the most innovative operators in that space," said Anna Sainsbury, CEO of GeoComply USA. "We have designed Solus to fit the specific characteristics of the daily fantasy sports market, where ease of UX and speed of transaction is key, while ensuring that the increased need for geolocation services within the DFS industry are met." 
"DraftDay Gaming Group is committed to being the safest and most secure DFS operator in the industry. By teaming up with GeoComply, the market-leader in geolocation services, we are providing our players with the highest level of consumer confidence with a unique user-friendly, B2B platform required to meet the demands of a rapidly changing environment," said Rich Roberts CEO of DraftDay. 
For more information contact:
